text:
(CFR): The CFR represents the proportion 
of women dying because of direct obstetric 
complications out of all women who were 
admitted to health facilities who experienced 
such complications. In Uganda, the all-
facility CFR decreased by 25% (from 2.6% 
at baseline to 2.0% at endline). 
The CFR for EmONC facilities in Uganda 
(providing either Basic or Comprehensive 
EmONC) fell by 18% (from 2.9% to 2.4%). In 
Zambia, the all-facility CFR decreased by 34% 
(from 3.1% to 2.0%), and the rate for
